I have to opine that we really have no idea yet whether that is all  
true or not. Only time will tell and only the if a wide variety of  
researchers use the equipment under varying circumstances.

Ann

On Dec 3, 2007, at 8:49 PM, bruce halliday wrote:

> Frank,
>
> After doing box research for a while now and having the opportunity  
> to work with several different
> types of boxes. I would have to agree the boxes are meant for and  
> work better as a stationary communication device
> sort of like a communication station that is consistently under the  
> same basic conditions. I have never taken my boxes out of my home
> or done a session out side of my home and I don't believe that  
> taking the box , any box not just yours to a remote allegedly  
> haunted location
> will not serve to enhance communication. And if anyone is really  
> concerned about summoning dark entities they have a much better chance
> of that communicating with a grounded and maybe disgruntled or  
> confused entity at a haunted location.
>
> so I agree with your assessment of box use 100%

> box, myself, as The Box Maker, is minimalized by Moon. Moon puts my  
> name out there connected with his so called 'telephone to the  
> dead', and I very much disapprove of my name being applied to an  
> unauthorized use of my equipment. I don't give a crap what he gets  
> through the boxes, or does with it, but don't make it look like I  
> designed it specificaly as the 'telephone to the dead', I designed  
> it as a friggin' ITC device, that is capable of two way  
> communication--SOMETIMES, it's not like it's a guarenteed  
> connection, and you can't just dial up anyone, anytime, that's an  
> exageration! The "box" was intended by me to be used in a fixed  
> location, just by taking it to a GHU, or an "investiigation" is  
> using it in a way I did not intend, and I still say it's better if  
> used in one place. All guide lines I have offered for box use are  
> completely ignored, not just by Moon, to be fair.
>
>
>  It has been shown that many different approaches work for this  
> communcation, I suggest Moon design and build his own 'telephone  
> the dead' and leave my name out of it.
